mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_category (parent_id, name, sort_order, create_time, update_time) values ( #{category.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category.sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())
mapper.update:
update neuedu_category
parent_id = #{category.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{category.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{category.status,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{category.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id AS id, a.parent_id as parent_id, a.name AS name, a.status AS status, a.sort_order AS sort_order, a.create_time AS create_time, a.update_time AS update_time, b.id AS parentId, b.parent_id as parent_parent_id, b.name AS parent_name, b.status AS parent_status, b.sort_order AS parent_sort_order, b.create_time AS parent_create_time, b.update_time AS parent_update_time from neuedu_category a JOIN neuedu_category b on a.parent_id=b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id AS id, a.parent_id as parent_id, a.name AS name, a.status AS status, a.sort_order AS sort_order, a.create_time AS create_time, a.update_time AS update_time, b.id AS parentId, b.parent_id as parent_parent_id, b.name AS parent_name, b.status AS parent_status, b.sort_order AS parent_sort_order, b.create_time AS parent_create_time, b.update_time AS parent_update_time from neuedu_category a JOIN neuedu_category b on a.parent_id=b.id
